scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format:all: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.type-check:all: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run format:all
